text:
I really like the way you’ve laid out your services! It’s extremely clean and by presenting it in the form of a solution, it makes it easy for the customer to know exactly what to select.

If C is your preference (and it really seems like it provides the most value since it could save up to 40 hours per week), perhaps you could add some kind of a “best value” flag to the Package C’s title? That way it will pop out from the page a bit more, drawing the eye to the final (and best) option. And since it offers everything in A and B, I would highlight that as well. Your design is very clean, the only change I would suggest is to highlight somehow the line that says, “Everything in packages A and B, plus:”

I hope that helps! And best of luck to you :+1:
